text.content:
A corrupted wasteland maintained by a lich formerly a powerful sorcerer. Dead trees, twisted plants, and corrupted animals dominate. Eastern road passes through, but few survive the journey.

visualMotif: Twisted, leafless trees; gray-green fog; faint glowing runes; shriveled corpses and animals

"rumors": [

"The Blight grows slowly but steadily eastward (true)",

"Nothing lives long here (true)",

"The Blight is punishment from the gods (false)",

"Powerful sorcerer-turned-lich maintains this region (true)"
